title: UK First Regional Chief AI Officer

classification.classificationRationale: Decision tree: Formal AI unit=YES (CAIO + AI task force) → Publishes research=NO → Central team=YES (AI task force) → Builds or enables=ENABLES (health, transport, education AI coordination) → M2 Center of Excellence. Low confidence: single thin source. Regional government CAIO — distinctive as sub-national AI governance.

description: Liverpool City Region appointed Tiffany St James as the UK's first regional Chief AI Officer. St James leads a new AI task force responsible for AI coordination across health, transport, and education. She sits on the Global AI Council and brings a public sector digital background: she was the UK Cabinet Office's first Head of Public Participation and co-created DATA.GOV.UK with Sir Tim Berners-Lee. The appointment is part of Mayor Steve Rotheram's AI strategy, connected to a Kyndryl AI hub creating up to 1,000 jobs in the region.
